title: Atlas VPN Zero-Day Allows Sites to Discover Linux Users’ IP Address
description:
Atlas VPN has confirmed the existence of a zero-day vulnerability that may allow website owners to discover Linux users’ real IP address.

The post Atlas VPN Zero-Day Allows Sites to Discover Linux Users’ IP Address appeared first on Linux Today.

title: KDE Plasma 6 Roadmap Unveiled: When Can You Expect It?
description:
KDE developers decided when users might expect the final stable release of KDE Plasma 6 at their annual Akademy meeting. Here’s when it arrives!

The post KDE Plasma 6 Roadmap Unveiled: When Can You Expect It? appeared first on Linux Today.

title: Librum: Promising E-book Reader That Lets You Create an Online Library
description:
In this guide, we will explore the new open-source e-book reader Librum, which offers users the ability to build a cloud library.

The post Librum: Promising E-book Reader That Lets You Create an Online Library appeared first on Linux Today.

title: MX Linux Unveils New Tool: MX Service Manager
description:
Learn about the new tool from the MX Linux team, MX Service Manager, which enables you to manage system services efficiently.

The post MX Linux Unveils New Tool: MX Service Manager appeared first on Linux Today.

title: LibreOffice 7.5.6 Office Suite Released With 50+ Bug Fixes
description:
LibreOffice 7.5.6 addresses a total of 53 bugs that have been reported by users or discovered by the LibreOffice developers.

The post LibreOffice 7.5.6 Office Suite Released With 50+ Bug Fixes appeared first on Linux Today.

title: GNU’s Having a 40th Birthday Party, and You’re Invited!
description:
GNU’s turning 40! The Free Software Foundation is pulling out all of the stops for a birthday celebration hack day on October 1.

The post GNU’s Having a 40th Birthday Party, and You’re Invited! appeared first on Linux Today.
